name: Liver Surgery
shortDescription: A liver resection is the surgical removal of all or a portion of the liver. It is also referred to as a hepatectomy, full or partial.

name: Ear Infection
shortDescription: An ear infection is an infection of the middle ear, the air-filled space behind the eardrum that contains the tiny vibrating bones of the ear.
